SideWays: 
 
Sideways wasn't an angry person by nature... he knew right from 
wrong, and with his skills as a mentor and a sensie in the arts of 
combat, but he was not going to believe the same autobot who died 
thrice in the war was now a killing machine, and he knew prime 
himself, and his minicon, he'd herd his decendent Optimus Primal died 
saving cybertron from the decendent of megatron, but this woman was 
telling lies, and with the the message he had to give, it must be a 
lie... "If Crosswise wasn't a decepticon loyalist i'd 
blow your lying head off Junk." He turned and picked up Rook the 
black bot. "You'll live, but if your lying... i'll be b...Kaoooow!" 
 
NightViper: 

NightViper walked out of the brush his face was cracked and one eye 
was black and his teeth were smashed in one shoulder had wires and 
scales hanging by threads, he Lifted the crossbow and walked over to 
sideways the paralyses venom would keep him quite. "Are you...." he 
stoped as a spark erupted from his cheek he picked up some dirt and 
smeared it over the small fire... "Are you o-k my love?" One arm hung 
usless and he soon dropped the cross bow due to the lack of strength 
to carry it anymore. He dropped to his knees beside 
her and crawled over rapping his good arm around her. 
 
Starstorm: 
 
"Now, I am"said while she huged her, she didn't like to admit it but 
she was scared to death. 
 
NightViper: 
 
He smiled resting his head on her shoulder... then he jumped back 
startled. "Tell me he's head still there..." 
 
Sideways: 
 
Sideways lay quite and unmoving, but the silver, and black bot were 
missing... 
 
Starstorm: 
 
Starstorm walked carefully where Sideway was, she said worried "The 
smaller bots have gone!!!! NightViper we have to come back the 
base!!!!." 
 
Crosswise&Rook: 
 
The two bots transformed with a small pop and stood as the bike's 
rider. "Whiiiir pop pop peep?" It lifted the snatched crossbow and 
waited. 
 
NightViper: 
 
"I'm not sure how far i'll make it... And we can't leave this guy 
here... better go for help Star..." 
 
Starstorm: 
 
"I can't leave you... I don't like lost you..."said with sorrow the 
femme 
 
NightViper: 

He smiled kissing her gently. "Either you go or we'll both be ssscrap 
if he awakesss." He opened a panel on his chest and took out a silver 
CD. "Take thisss, just incassse..." He looked at her 
lovingly. "Trussst me, i'll be fine." 
 
Starstorm: 
  
Starstorm took the CD and hide it in one of her several 
compartiments. After that she huged him thight and kiss him once 
more. "I'll be back soon with help.... I promise, just don't die..." 
  
She quickly run towards the Base 
 
NightVIper: 
 
NightViper smiled and turned to the underbrush. "well aren't you guys 
going to sssave your bossssss?" 
 
Crosswise&Rook: 
 
The combine bots walked out and blinked nodding, dropping the 
crossbow they dragged sideways into the brush... 
 
NightViper: 
 
NightViper sighed. "Bequick my love..." 
 
SideWays: 
 
Sideways groaned as the smaller bot dragged him away. "easy boys, the 
paint job..." 
 
Starstorm:
 
Starstorm run as far as she could, her wings had been seriously 
damaged, so she couldn't fly in a while.  Soon she would be in the 
base
